snippet: How four bills are presented to the full Senate — and which ones Senator Harry Reid chooses to promote — will probably reshape the debate over what to do about gun violence.
lead_paragraph: How four bills are presented to the full Senate — and which ones Senator Harry Reid chooses to promote — will probably reshape the debate over what to do about gun violence.

headline.seo: As Gun Bills Advance, Spotlight Falls on Reid
headline.main: As Gun Measures Advance, Spotlight Falls on Reid
